page.title: 08MARKET RASEN-INDUSTRY
page.content: Traditionally, local industry has been largely concerned with providing services for the surrounding agricultural fraternity. This continues with machinery distributors, suppliers of general farm requirements fencing etc. together with fertiliser, seed and feedstuffs stockists. The major employer in the town is a manufacturer of plastic boxes for a variety of specialist uses- such as first-aid cases. Other industries, some on the District Council sponsored industrial site, are printing, packaging, saddlery, deep-sea fishing equipment, deep- freeze storage and a number of road-haulage companies, some of which are one-man concerns. There are a number of other 'service' in- dustries including 7 motor engineers and an area office of the Milk Marketing Board.
